title: Rihanna dances to Tierra Whack and shows off sexy outfit on Instagram
text:
To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

Rihanna might be a superstar musician, fashion designer and all-round boss, but even she can’t resist having a little dance around in her wardrobe when she’s feeling her outfit.

The singer appears to be enjoying a little bit of well-earned time out after a busy few weeks of shows, launches and red carpets.

And the singer took to Instagram to show fans her look of the day while she was hanging out in what appeared to be her wardrobe.

In the short clip, the 31-year-old teamed a voluminous red bandeau top with denim hotpants and strapped heels and something tells us a couple of those items are from her luxury fashion brand FENTY.

Tierra Whack’s hit CLONES can be heard in the background as the rapper spits: ‘Stole my style, you guilty/ N**** try to take my flow/ Who the hell he think he is?/I just wanna make my dough/Gotta take care of my kids.’

The rapper was one of the lucky musicians who were chosen to perform at Rihanna’s ground-breaking SavageXFenty lingerie show last month.

Rihanna took to Instagram to show fans her outfit of the day while she hanging out in what appeared to be her wardrobe (Picture: Rihanna/Instagram)

Big names like Gigi and Bella Hadid, Cara Delevingne and Joan Smalls walked alongside Amputees, trans superstars and curvier models in a show that was all about diversity and equal opportunity

And all those with an Amazon Prime account are now able to watch the models and dancers shake what their mama gave ‘em under the slick direction of choreographer Parris Goebel.

Meanwhile Riri recently rubbished those pregnancy rumours in the way only she can – by posting a slo-mo video of herself strutting around in a bikini while a blunt hangs from her mouth.

What did we do to deserve such a boss ass chick?!
